sentences.en: All employees will refer to each other by the honorific suffix "san".
sentences.cn: 所有雇员相互称呼时都须在名字后添加敬语san（日语表示“先生”，“女士”）。

sentences.en: He was given the honorific title of national chairman.
sentences.cn: 他被授予国家名誉主席的称呼。

sentences.en: His use of the honorific'sir " would multiply while he assumed a glacial demeanor.
sentences.cn: 他会摆出一副冷若冰霜的样子,并不断使用 “ 阁下 ” 这种尊称.

sentences.en: Honorific clients: attention, The location happened emergencies, please depart the location quickly by waiters!
sentences.cn: 各位顾客: 请注意, 本场所发生安全紧急状况, 请您在工作人员的指引下,迅速撤离!

sentences.en: Honorific customer, once receiving your message, we will give you the reply as soon as possible!
sentences.cn: 尊敬的客户, 一旦收到您的留言, 我们将尽快给您答复!

sentences.en: In such occasions, Qiu as Taketo the honorific.
sentences.cn: 在此种场合下, 太尉是作为武人的尊称.

sentences.en: Modest and honorific is a typical social deixis, which includes modest title , honorific title.
sentences.cn: 谦辞敬语是典型的社交指示语, 敬称和谦称也是其中的一部分.

sentences.en: Some verbs have the corresponding honorific verb.
sentences.cn: 一些动词有专门的敬语动词.

sentences.en: The formal ones include honorific deferential , and humbling terms, all of them generally universal and systematic.
sentences.cn: 正式称谓分为尊称、敬称、谦称等礼貌称谓, 一般具有共性与系统性.

sentences.en: The one - to - one correspondence between marida and sentence - ending honorific is restrained by its verb - like morphological transformation.
sentences.cn: “(符号略)”与终结词尾表现出一一对应的关系,这是由其表面形态决定的.

sentences.en: Toyoda said using a standard honorific for the two men.
sentences.cn: 他在话中使用了标准的敬称.

sentences.en: You cannot get him, not even in the most honorific manner of invitation.
sentences.cn: 就是用八抬大轿, 都别想把他请来.

words.tran_cn: 受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的
荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的
尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据

trans.tran_cn: 尊敬的，表示敬意的，敬称的
trans.tran_en: An honorific title or way of talking is used to show respect or honour to someone
an expression or title that is used to show respect for the person you are speaking to
